name: Uniform form of written financing statement and amendment
text:
(a)  A filing office that accepts written records for filing may not refuse to accept a written initial financing statement amendment in the following form, except for a reason set forth in section 490:9-516(b):
(Form begins on next page)


	(b)  A filing office that accepts written records for filing may not refuse to accept a written financing statement in the following form, except for a reason set forth in section 490:9-516(b):


	(c)  A form that a filing office may not refuse to accept under subsection (a) or (b) must conform to the format prescribed for the form by the National Conference of Commissioners on Uniform State Laws. [L 2000, c 241, pt of §1]
